import React, { useEffect }from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelectot} from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Back {loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? 'Available' : 'Out of Stock'} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
